name: CSS fixes project for Dueling Nexus
description:
This code has no theme to it. It is exclusively fixes for the online Yu-Gi-Oh! simulator Dueling Nexus, so it works better on mobile devices. However, it should work just as well on larger displays as well.
Please send me feedback @Yubelious!#5584 on Discord. If you are making your own CSS theme and would like help, or would like to help others test and write their own themes, please consider joining our Dueling Nexus Unofficial Development Extensions server (DM me on Discord for invite).

Now with skins!
Jaden and Yubel: https://userstyles.org/styles/140830/j-y-theme-and-fixes
Bakura: https://userstyles.org/styles/160839/bakura
Grayscale: https://userstyles.org/styles/176032/grayscale-skin
additional_info:
Changelog
v1.4 Fixed up some stuff broken by an update, redid the Login & Register pages to account for the new Privacy Policy, added code for the Privacy Policy page, added Donate & Privacy Policy pages to the global CSS, increased the line-height for the table buttons, made adjustments to the settings tab, modified the buttons on the editor menu to prevent overflow, added transition feature to the navbar, added the Leaderboard page to the global CSS, and updated the Profile page.

v1.3 Made minor adjustments to #socket-connection, added a black navbar, adjusted some elements to account for the new navbar, got rid of a lot of unneccesary scrollbars, article resizing now only affects the login register and recover pages, made numerous changes to the login register recover and profile pages, fixed all the hover animations I could find, News now hides when not in use, swapped the editor buttons to the left side the way I like them, adjusted the editor topbar to allow for max characters without clipping, added a background colour and line breaks to the siding tutorial, adjusted checkboxes and their labels, made major size changes to the editor and related elements, added the donate page, set a specific size/padding to the button icons, and added an entire section of code dedicated for resolutions under 1250px wide.

v1.2 Moved and increased the size of the phase buttons, adjusted some other buttons for large amounts of text, some other minor changes in how I size buttons.

v1.1 Deleted code made obsolete by update, recoded the navigation pages, fixed the scrolling bug in the deck constructor.
